nodes.text: The Hoth system was the remote star system located in the Anoat sector of the Outer Rim Territories that contained the planets Hoth, Jhas, and at least four other worlds, as well as a chaotic asteroid field. It was reputedly devoid of human lifeforms, at least until the Alliance to Restore the Republic established its new base on Hoth, following the Battle of Yavin.
